categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sorven was a captain in the Imperial Military who joined the Order of Revan on the planet Rishi during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Sorven did not trust the Revanites who were former members of the Republic, and discussed the possibility that they would turn on the former Imperials with fellow Revanite Major Krigg.
